photonmap.Loader
================

.. py:module:: photonmap.Loader

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module contains the functions which are used to create the mesh 3D from the data (geometry, materials) from files and add it to the main scene

----------

   :maxdepth: 1

   /autoapi/photonmap/Loader/LoadPlant/index
